titleStmt.title: The elder brother a comedie. Acted at the Blacke Friers, by his Maiesties Servants. Printed according to the true copie. Written by Iohn Fletcher Gent.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by F[elix] K[ingston] for I. W[aterson] and I. B[enson],

notesStmt.note: Acts I and V are ascribed to Philip Massinger, who probably completed the play after Fletcher's death.
Printer's and publishers' names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
